                  <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
      </font></div>
                </td>
                <td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                  <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">4.</font></font></div>
                </td>
                <td><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><font size="2">REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES AND
  COVENANTS</font></font></td>
              </tr>
          </table>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center">
          <table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="hangingindent" width="100%">
              <tr valign="top">
                <td style="WIDTH: 21.499pt">
                  <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
      </font></div>
                </td>
                <td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">4.1</font></div>
                </td>
                <td>
                  <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Evatech
      represents, warrants and agrees that as of the Effective Date and the
      Closing Date:</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
          </table>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
        <div>
          <table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="hangingindent" width="100%">
              <tr valign="top">
                <td style="WIDTH: 57pt">
                  <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
      </font></div>
                </td>
                <td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">a)</font></div>
                </td>
                <td>
                  <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Evatech
      is duly incorporated, validly existing under the laws of Japan, and is a
      corporation subject to Rehabilitation Proceedings under the Civil
      Rehabilitation Act;</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
          </table>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
          <div>
            <table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="hangingindent" width="100%">
                <tr valign="top">
                  <td style="WIDTH: 57pt">
                    <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
      </font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                    <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">b)</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td>
                    <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Evatech
      has the complete ability to execute its right and its action to enter into
      and perform under this Agreement except for the matters restricted by the
      Civil Rehabilitation Act;</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
            </table>
          </div>
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
                <div>
                  <table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="hangingindent" width="100%">
                      <tr valign="top">
                        <td style="WIDTH: 57pt">
                          <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
      </font></div>
                        </td>
                        <td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                          <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">c)</font></div>
                        </td>
                        <td>
                          <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">the
      execution of this Agreement and the performance of the transactions
      contemplated hereunder are acts within the scope of the purpose of
      Evatech;</font></div>
                        </td>
                      </tr>
                  </table>
                </div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
                      <div>
                        <table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="hangingindent" width="100%">
                            <tr valign="top">
                              <td style="WIDTH: 57pt">
                                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
      </font></div>
                              </td>
                              <td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">d)</font></div>
                              </td>
                              <td>
                                <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Evatech
      has completed all the procedures required by the laws, its articles of
      association and other internal rules to enter into and perform this
      Agreement (except that the approvals and consents set out in Clause 3.1(e)
      above have not been obtained as of the Effective
  Date);</font></div>
                              </td>
                            </tr>
                        </table>
                      </div>
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
                            <div>
                              <table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="hangingindent" width="100%">
                                  <tr valign="top">
                                    <td style="WIDTH: 57pt">
                                      <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
      </font></div>
                                    </td>
                                    <td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                                      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">e)</font></div>
                                    </td>
                                    <td>
                                      <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">the
      execution of this Agreement and the performance and transactions under
      this Agreement by Evatech do not:</font></div>
                                    </td>
                                  </tr>
                              </table>
                            </div>
                            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
                              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
                                  <div>
                                    <table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="hangingindent" width="100%">
                                        <tr valign="top">
                                          <td style="WIDTH: 93pt">
                                            <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
      </font></div>
                                          </td>
                                          <td style="WIDTH: 36pt"><font size="2">(i)</font></td>
                                          <td><font size="2">violate the laws or authorizations Evatech is bound by;
      or</font></td>
                                        </tr>
                                    </table>
                                  </div>
                                </div>
                              </div>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </div>

      </div>

    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center">
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
            <div>
              <table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="hangingindent" width="100%">
                  <tr valign="top">
                    <td style="WIDTH: 93pt">
                      <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
      </font></div>
                    </td>
                    <td style="WIDTH: 36pt"><font size="2">(ii)&#160;</font></td>
                    <td><font size="2">violate Evatech&#8217;s articles of association or other
      internal rules;</font></td>
                  </tr>
              </table>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
                  <div>
                    <table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="hangingindent" width="100%">
                        <tr valign="top">
                          <td style="WIDTH: 57pt">
                            <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
      </font></div>
                          </td>
                          <td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                            <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">f)</font></div>
                          </td>
                          <td>
                            <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">the
      person who signs or attaches the seal to this Agreement as the
      representative of Evatech is authorized to sign or attach the seal to this
      Agreement as the representative of Evatech under the laws, the articles of
      association, and the procedures required by any other internal
      rules;</font></div>
                          </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>
                  </div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
                        <div>
                          <table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="hangingindent" width="100%">
                              <tr valign="top">
                                <td style="WIDTH: 57pt">
                                  <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
      </font></div>
                                </td>
                                <td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">g)</font></div>
                                </td>
                                <td>
                                  <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">the
      materials, documents and information provided by Evatech to GaoKe in
      writing or orally, are true and accurate in all material
      aspects;</font></div>
                                </td>
                              </tr>
                          </table>
                        </div>
                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

                              <div>

                                    <tr valign="top">

                                        <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
      </font></div>
                                      </td>
                                      <td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                                        <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">h)</font></div>
                                      </td>
                                      <td>
                                        <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Evatech
      has not presented a petition or made a resolution for proceedings for
      bankruptcy or any other proceeding related to its liquidation except with
      respect to the petition for the Rehabilitation
  Proceedings;</font></div>
                                      </td>
                                    </tr>
                                </table>
                              </div>
                              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
                                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

                                    <div>

                                          <tr valign="top">
                                            <td style="WIDTH: 57pt">
                                              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
      </font></div>
                                            </td>
                                            <td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                                              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">i)</font></div>
                                            </td>
                                            <td>
                                              <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">all
      28,670 shares of the Stock have been validly issued, are outstanding free
      of any Encumbrances and Evatech has the right to sell the Stock to
      GaoKe;</font></div>
                                            </td>
                                          </tr>
                                      </table>
                                    </div>
                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">

                                                <tr valign="top">

                                                    <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
      </font></div>
                                                  </td>
                                                  <td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                                                    <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">j)</font></div>
                                                  </td>
                                                  <td>
                                                    <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Evatech
      has no obligation to issue or sell any shares under any options, warrants
      or other rights;</font></div>
                                                  </td>
                                                </tr>
                                            </table>
                                          </div>

      </font></div>
                                                        </td>
                                                        <td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                                                          <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">k)</font></div>
                                                        </td>
                                                        <td>
                                                          <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">the
      financial statements that Evatech provided to GaoKe during the due
      diligence according to the MOU are substantially correct and complete and
      have been prepared in conformity with generally accepted accounting
      principles applied on a consistent basis as applicable to
      Evatech;</font></div>
                                                        </td>
                                                      </tr>
                                                  </table>
                                                </div>

                                                                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">l)</font></div>
                                                              </td>
                                                              <td>
                                                                <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">on
      the Closing Date, Evatech&#8217;s assets are not subject to any Encumbrances and
      Evatech has no substantial liabilities or contractual obligations,
      absolute or contingent, which are not shown or provided for in the balance
      sheet audited by Aska &amp; Co. as of July 31st, 2009, except: (i) those
      expressly listed or referred to in the other documents provided to GaoKe;
      and (ii) obligations or liabilities arising out of the operation of its
      business in the ordinary course and not commonly required to be referred
      to in financial statements; and (iii) contingency fee and whichever
      expenses due for attorney, consultant or whomever involved to close the
      financial structure dealt in this Agreement, provided, however, that the
      total of such fees and expenses referred to in this Clause 4.1(l) shall
      not exceed One Million United States Dollars (US$1,000,000) (subject to
      Clause 4.1(p) below) unless otherwise agreed by
  GaoKe;</font></div>
                                                              </td>
                                                            </tr>
                                                        </table>
                                                      </div>

                                                                    </td>
                                                                    <td>
                                                                      <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">there
      are no actions, suits, or proceedings, pending or, to the knowledge of
      Evatech, threatened which may result in any adverse judgment or liability,
      in excess of One Hundred Thousand United States Dollars (US$100,000) in
      the aggregate, or which may result in any material adverse change in the
      business, operations, properties or assets or in the condition, financial
      or otherwise, of Evatech;</font></div>
                                                                    </td>
                                                                  </tr>

      any court or governmental department, commission, board, agency or
      instrumentality, domestic or
foreign;</font></div>

      and</font></div>

                                                                                      <td>

      is not required to make any payment to Shibatsu Co., Ltd (whether under

    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center">
      <div>
        <table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="hangingindent" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td style="WIDTH: 21.4pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
      </font></div>
              </td>
              <td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">4.2</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">GaoKe
      represents, warrants and agrees that as of the Approval Date and the
      Closing Date:</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
        <div>
          <table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="hangingindent" width="100%">
              <tr valign="top">
                <td style="WIDTH: 57pt">
                  <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
      </font></div>
                </td>
                <td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">a)</font></div>
                </td>
                <td>
                  <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">GaoKe
      is a corporation duly organized and validly existing under the laws of
      China.</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
          </table>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
          <div>
            <table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="hangingindent" width="100%">
                <tr valign="top">
                  <td style="WIDTH: 57pt">
                    <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
      </font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                    <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">b)</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td>
                    <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">the
      Board of Directors of GaoKe has duly approved this Agreement and has
      authorized and approved the performance by GaoKe of all the acts and
      transactions contemplated hereby on the terms contained in this
      Agreement;</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
            </table>
          </div>
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
            <div>
              <table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="hangingindent" width="100%">
                  <tr valign="top">
                    <td style="WIDTH: 57pt">
                      <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
      </font></div>
                    </td>
                    <td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">c)</font></div>
                    </td>
                    <td>
                      <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">the
      execution and carrying out of this Agreement, to the best of the knowledge
      and belief of GaoKe, will not violate any provisions of the laws of China
      or Japan; and</font></div>
                    </td>
                  </tr>
              </table>
            </div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

                          </div>
                        </td>
                        <td>
                          <div align="justify">
                            <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">GaoKe
      understands that no public market now exists for any of the Stock issued
      by Evatech, and that Evatech has made no assurances that a public market
      will ever exist for the
Stock.</font></div>

            <td>
              <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Evatech

  GaoKe:</font></div>

                          <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(i)</font></div>

                      <div align="justify">

      a loan from a third

        <div>
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
              <div>
                <table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="hangingindent" width="100%">
                    <tr valign="top">
                      <td style="WIDTH: 93pt">
                        <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
      </font></div>
                      </td>
                      <td style="WIDTH: 36pt">

                            <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(ii)</font></div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                      <td>
                        <div align="justify">
                          <div align="justify">
                            <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">create
      a security interest for a third
  party;</font></div>
                          </div>

                </table>

      Board of Directors of Evatech as of the Closing Date shall consist of the
      following members
only:</font></div>

            <tr valign="top">

                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">5.1</font></div>
                </div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">GaoKe
      will not change the current operating team of Evatech as listed in Exhibit
      D hereto (other than the changes set out in Clause 3.1(h) above) and shall
      use its best efforts to maintain the management structure of Evatech for a
      period of three (3) years following the Closing
  Date.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>

                      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">5.2</font></div>
                    </div>
                  </td>
                  <td>
                    <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Evatech
      shall use its best efforts to keep its current employees, as listed in
      Exhibit E hereto, especially those employees in the research and
      development section, for a period of three (3) years following the Closing
      Date.</font></div>
                  </td>

                      <td><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><font size="2">CONFIDENTIALITY</font></font></td>

              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
                  <div>&#160;</div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center">
                    <table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="hangingindent" width="100%">
                        <tr valign="top">

                            <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
                              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">6.1</font></div>
                            </div>
                          </td>
                          <td>
                            <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">During
      the term of this Agreement and for three (3) years following any
      expiration or termination hereof, except as may be required by applicable
      laws, neither of the Parties nor their respective affiliate companies
      shall, without the prior written consent of the other
    Party:</font></div>
                          </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>
                  </div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
                      <div>

                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center">

                              <tr valign="top">
                                <td style="WIDTH: 57pt">
                                  <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
      </font></div>
                                </td>
                                <td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
                                    <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">a)</font></div>
                                  </div>
                                </td>
                                <td>
                                  <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">disclose
      to any person or entity (other than directors and employees of the Parties
      and their respective advisers on a &#8220;need to know&#8221; basis) any information
      which may be acquired from the other Party in relation to this Agreement
      or any other agreements entered into pursuant to this
      Agreement;</font></div>
                                </td>
                              </tr>
                          </table>
                        </div>

                                        </div>
                                      </td>

      any public announcement or press release with regard to the subject matter
      hereof or to the existence of this Agreement without the prior written
      consent of the other Party.</font></div>

              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">16.1</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Any
      dispute or controversy between the Parties which may arise out of or in
      relation to this Agreement, including with respect to the validity,
      invalidity, breach or termination hereof, shall first be attempted to be
      settled by friendly arrangements between the
  Parties.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>

            </td>
            <td>
              <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">If
      an amicable settlement is not reached, such a dispute or controversy shall
      be finally settled by arbitration in Hong Kong under the Hong Kong
      International Arbitration Centre Administered Arbitration Rules in force
      when the Notice of Arbitration is submitted in accordance with such
      Rules.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>

event a Party to this Agreement initiates any action, suit, motion, application,
arbitration or other proceeding which concerns the interpretation or enforcement
of this Agreement, the prevailing Party in such action, suit, motion,
application, arbitration or other proceeding, or judgment creditor, shall be
entitled to recover its reasonable costs and reasonable attorneys&#8217; fees from the
non-prevailing Party or judgment debtor, including costs and fees on appeal, if
any, without giving effect to any statutory presumption or
limitation.</font></div>

    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 27pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">IN WITNESS WHEREOF</font>, the
Parties hereto have caused this Agreement to be signed by their duly authorized
officer or representative as of the date and year first above
written.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

behalf of <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Liaoning GaoKe Energy

            </td>
            <td style="WIDTH: 18pt">
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">1)</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Treatment
      of decimal fraction of the discharged
amounts</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 99pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Any
decimal fraction of the discharged amounts will be rounded off.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center">
      <table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="hangingindent" width="100%">
          <tr valign="top">
            <td style="WIDTH: 63pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
      </font></div>
            </td>
            <td style="WIDTH: 18pt">
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">2)</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Designation
      of bank accounts for payment</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 99pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The
rehabilitation creditors will designate bank accounts in writing, within
fourteen days after the definitive decree date of the approval of the
Rehabilitation Plan, for payment under the Rehabilitation Plan.&#160;&#160;The
rehabilitation debtor will bear the bank remittance charges to remit payments
under the Rehabilitation Plan to such designated bank
accounts.&#160;&#160;However, in case bank accounts are not designated as
stipulated above, the rehabilitation creditors will receive payments at the head
office of the rehabilitation debtor.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center">&#160;</div>

                  <td colspan="2" valign="middle" width="40%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 0.5pt solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 0.5pt solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">TAIWAN
      BRANCH</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="middle" width="34%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 0.5pt solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
                </tr>
